# Umbraco.Community.YouTubePicker 

[![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/nuget/dt/Umbraco.Community.YouTubePicker?color=cc9900)](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Umbraco.Community.YouTubePicker/)
[![NuGet](https://img.shields.io/nuget/vpre/Umbraco.Community.YouTubePicker?color=0273B3)](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Umbraco.Community.YouTubePicker)
[![GitHub license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/redmorello/Umbraco.Community.YouTubePicker?color=8AB803)](../LICENSE)

Custom Umbraco datatype to enable editors to pick YouTube videos or playlists from a specific YouTube channel.

You'll need a Google account and signup for an API key before you can use it.

## Installation

Add the package to an existing Umbraco website (v15+) from nuget:

`dotnet add package Umbraco.Community.YouTubePicker`
